mapper.select: SELECT TASK_INSTID, TASK_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, EXC_STAT, EXC_SRC FROM T_QUARTZ_LOG WHERE TASK_ID = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_QUARTZ_LOG(TASK_INSTID, TASK_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, EXC_STAT, EXC_SRC) VALUES (#{taskInstid}, #{taskId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{excStat}, #{excSrc})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT TMP_TB.*,ROWNUM ROW_ID FROM ( SELECT l.TASK_INSTID, s.TASK_NAME, l.START_DATE, l.END_DATE, l.EXC_STAT, l.EXC_SRC FROM T_QUARTZ_LOG l LEFT JOIN T_QUARTZ_SET s ON s.task_id=l.task_id where l.TASK_ID = #{taskId} order by l.start_date desc ) TMP_TB WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{rows} ) WHERE ROW_ID > (#{page} - 1) * #{rows}

select count(*) from( SELECT l.TASK_INSTID, s.TASK_NAME, l.START_DATE, l.END_DATE, l.EXC_STAT, l.EXC_SRC FROM T_QUARTZ_LOG l LEFT JOIN T_QUARTZ_SET s ON s.task_id=l.task_id where l.TASK_ID = #{taskId} order by l.start_date desc )

SELECT TASK_INSTID,TASK_ID,START_DATE,END_DATE,EXC_STAT,EXC_SRC FROM T_QUARTZ_LOG t where t.TASK_ID = #{taskId} and to_date(START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')= (select max(to_date(START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) from T_QUARTZ_LOG where TASK_ID = t.TASK_ID and to_date(START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(START_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) AND ROWNUM = '1' ORDER BY T.START_DATE DESC
